title: The CEO's Dilemma
scenario: You are a CEO deciding whether to honor a partnership agreement or break it for short-term gain
context: Two competing companies have formed a strategic alliance

title: The Market Competition
scenario: You are a business owner choosing between fair pricing or undercutting your competitor
context: Two businesses in the same market must decide their pricing strategy

title: The Patent Sharing
scenario: You must decide whether to share research data or keep it proprietary
context: Two tech companies are collaborating on innovation

title: The Trade Agreement
scenario: You represent a nation deciding whether to honor trade commitments or impose tariffs
context: Two countries negotiating trade relations

title: The Arms Treaty
scenario: You are a diplomat choosing between disarmament or military buildup
context: Two nations in arms control negotiations

title: The Climate Accord
scenario: You must decide whether to reduce emissions or prioritize economic growth
context: Two countries in climate negotiations

title: The Neighborhood Watch
scenario: You are deciding whether to volunteer for community safety or free-ride
context: Two neighbors organizing community safety

title: The Group Project
scenario: You must choose between contributing fully or letting your partner do the work
context: Two students working on an academic project

title: The Carpool Agreement
scenario: You are deciding whether to stick to the driving schedule or skip your turns
context: Two colleagues sharing commute responsibilities

title: The Water Conservation
scenario: You must decide whether to conserve water or use as much as needed
context: Two farmers sharing a limited water source

title: The Forest Protection
scenario: You are choosing between sustainable harvesting or maximum extraction
context: Two logging companies in the same forest

title: The Athletic Alliance
scenario: You must decide whether to play fairly or use performance enhancers
context: Two athletes in the same competition

title: The Team Strategy
scenario: You are choosing between team play or individual glory
context: Two players on the same team

title: The Open Source Dilemma
scenario: You must decide whether to contribute code or use others' contributions
context: Two developers in an open source project

title: The Data Privacy Pact
scenario: You are choosing between protecting user data or exploiting it for profit
context: Two tech companies handling user information

title: The Wartime Alliance
scenario: You must decide whether to support your ally or pursue separate peace
context: Two nations in a military alliance

title: The Resistance Network
scenario: You are choosing between sharing intelligence or protecting your own agents
context: Two resistance cells coordinating operations

title: The Research Collaboration
scenario: You must decide whether to share findings or publish independently
context: Two researchers working on similar problems

title: The Laboratory Resources
scenario: You are choosing between sharing equipment or monopolizing it
context: Two research teams needing the same resources

title: The Price Fixing Temptation
scenario: You must decide whether to maintain agreed prices or undercut for market share
context: Two companies in price coordination

title: The Supply Chain Alliance
scenario: You are choosing between reliable deliveries or cutting costs
context: Two suppliers in a distribution network

title: The Cultural Exchange
scenario: You must decide whether to genuinely participate or just extract benefits
context: Two communities in cultural exchange

title: The Artist Collective
scenario: You are choosing between sharing techniques or keeping trade secrets
context: Two artists in a creative collaboration

title: The Space Colony Accord
scenario: You must decide whether to share resources or hoard for your colony
context: Two space colonies on a distant planet

title: The AI Ethics Agreement
scenario: You are choosing between ethical AI development or competitive advantage
context: Two AI companies setting industry standards

title: The Investment Partnership
scenario: You must decide whether to honor investment terms or pursue better opportunities
context: Two investment firms in a joint venture

title: The Credit Union Dilemma
scenario: You are choosing between responsible lending or profit maximization
context: Two financial institutions serving the same community

title: The Energy Grid Sharing
scenario: You must decide whether to share energy surplus or sell at premium
context: Two power companies managing regional energy

title: The Medical Research Alliance
scenario: You are choosing between sharing medical data or protecting competitive advantage
context: Two pharmaceutical companies researching treatments

title: The Transportation Cooperative
scenario: You must decide whether to coordinate schedules or compete for passengers
context: Two transportation companies serving the same routes

title: The Academic Publishing Alliance
scenario: You are choosing between open access or subscription models
context: Two academic publishers setting industry standards

scenario: You are choosing between honoring usage terms or exploiting loopholes

scenario: You must decide whether to share vaccine doses or prioritize your population

scenario: You are choosing between fair network sharing or monopolizing capacity
context: Two internet service providers managing infrastructure

title: The Agricultural Cooperative
scenario: You must decide whether to share farming equipment or keep it exclusive
context: Two farming communities pooling resources

context: Two emergency services coordinating disaster response

title: The Talent Recruitment Pact
scenario: You must decide whether to respect hiring agreements or poach talent
context: Two companies in competitive talent markets

title: The Environmental Cleanup Alliance
scenario: You are choosing between sharing cleanup costs or avoiding responsibility
context: Two industrial companies addressing pollution

title: The Streaming Content Partnership
scenario: You must decide whether to share exclusive content or keep it proprietary
context: Two streaming platforms negotiating content access

title: The Space Station Maintenance
scenario: You are choosing between contributing to maintenance or relying on others

title: The Cybersecurity Information Sharing

scenario: You are choosing between coordinating satellite positions or competing for prime orbits
